snippet: After a two-day shuttering of the popular 28-seat Greenwich Village restaurant by the New York City Department of Health for a mouse infestation, it opened for dinner after 5 p.m. Friday.
abstract: After a two-day shuttering of the popular 28-seat Greenwich Village restaurant by the New York City Department of Health for a mouse infestation, it opened for dinner after 5 p.m. Friday.

headline.main: Little Owl Reopens After Passing Inspection
